channel.title: Battlescape, need a bit of help please
channel.description:
1.) How do i fix the commands on battlescape? (iv look inside client.java and they have some commands already in, but most of them dont work such as: yell)
2.) How do i add models on battlescape? (they are missing the class8, so im not sure how to do this)
3.) How can i fix crowns on battlescape? (im not sure what to search for, i wanna make my owner crown work)

item.title: Battlescape, need a bit of help please

um okay, ill try that.

item.title: Battlescape, need a bit of help please
item.dc:creator: @shmidlap123 shmidlap123
item.description:
@shmidlap123 wrote:

I think i can help you with class8,
1.

On the Tools menu in Windows Explorer, click Folder Options.

Click the View tab.

Under Hidden files and folders, click Show hidden files and folders.
Alot of the time i see there hidden files in clients, that might help.

Read full topic
